name: Space Hunters - Xilabos Chronicles
description:
GameState :

This is my indie game and being a solo developer on this game, I basically got bored of it and is unfinished wanted to do many more things, If people like it I'll complete this,

Would love your comments/Reviews.

Many more ideas are there for this project including multiplayer and co-op Alien monsters hunting and a proper story ending.

Let's see... 

Story :

Play as a space mercenary who had recently arrived in Starless Hub, one of the tech production facilities located on the dark side of the Xilabos, a satellite to Planet Dinuhiri. Xilabos is known to be a unique moon full of precious metals and prosperous minerals. Nowadays humans consider Xilabos an anomaly due to absurd amount of earnt profit and locals use this as a banner for tourists and various types of mercenaries. Despite having a lack of breathable atmosphere or desired temperature range, Xilabos is a safe haven for most of the people. Implementing gadgets to breathe, to walk outside in your own skin and still be capable of speaking make the place wonderous. Extraneous mining, unrestricted use of Futuristic and peculiar scenery of local fauna can attract every type of person. Especially you looking for a quick profit! Previous events of dangerous wildlife appearing in the mining caves and even cyber facilities created a niche for recruitable shooters.

On Xilabos there are three in total stations, constructed in human colonized territories. Starless Hub produces gadgets and acts as a port for newcomers, while other two Hubs are for mining and military uses. Recently an increased number of space mercenaries were requested in Starless Hub due to threatening wildlife that need to be put down.
